text: Songül Öden (born 1979 in Diyarbakır) is a Turkish actress. She is famous for her role as Gümüş Şadoğlu in Turkish series Gümüş. She graduated in theatre from the University of Ankara. She is an ethnic Zaza.Songül Ö.: Annem Diyarbakırlı bir beyin kızı...Mirgün C.: Kürt mü? Songül Ö.: Zaza. Babam da Zaza. Annem Bingöl asıllı, babam Diyarbakırlı., "Beş kadının arasında büyüdüm, beş kadının başrolde olduğu bir dizi için antrenmanlıyım", Milliyet, 6 Ocak 2013. She is well-liked as an actress in the Middle East. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish television actors Category:Zaza Category:People from Diyarbakır Province
title: Songül Öden
